exceptions.tactic: intros m x y i j H1 H2 y0 dx m1 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7.

original: intros m x y i j H1 H2 y0 dx m1 H3 H4 H5 H6 H7. unfold m1, y0, dx. intros H8 H9. assert (H10: expf m x y0). { split; auto. } remember (MF.degree m x) as dx eqn:Eqdx. assert (H11: i <= j < dx - 1) by auto. destruct H11 as [H12 H13]. intros H13. eapply diff_x_x10; try eauto. - apply H1. - apply H2. - apply H8. - apply H10. - split; [lia | lia].
